metadata.description: Registry event fields for S1QL 2.0 queries

fields.description: The path to which a registry key was exported.
The path from which the registry key was imported.
Full path location of the Registry Key entry
Unique ID of registry key (as assigned by SentinelOne)
Registry previous value (in case of modification)
Registry previous full size (in case of modification)
Was the previous registry value full size or was it truncated (in case of modification)
Registry previous value type (in case of modification)
The Security Descriptor (SID) of the user/user group that owns the registry key.
Full size of registry value (in case it was truncated)
Is the registry value full size or is it truncated
